long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn the web into your study guide! 

AI Flashcards creates flashcards from any web page. Quiz yourself to make sure the key points stick.

Perfect for news articles and research papers.
